casebody.data:
Michael W. ROGERS, Plaintiff Below-Appellant,
v.
Matthew MORGAN, individually and in his official capacity as a Delaware State Trooper, the State of Delaware, and the Department of Public Safety- Division of State Police, Defendants Below-Appellees. No. 503, 2017 Supreme Court of Delaware. Submitted: January 9, 2018
Decided: January 24, 2018

Refused.
